introduction:
• To provide support to the classroom teaching to understand the Numerical Methods in a better way.
  • To provide application based approaches in chemical engineering which will help to solve problems at better accuracy rather than trial and error approach.
  • To provide a virtual environment for the students to learn and practice on its own.
  • To provide students to learn on their own pace concept.
  • Students will be able to analyze and select suitable methods to find the solution in chemical engineering.
  • Students will be able to write programs to solve the application based problems in chemical engineering.
  • Pre-test and post-test will provide the students to gauge their performance.
  • Theory will provide deep inside of the numerical methods in chemical engineering.
